verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* Pharaoh, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* say \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, Thus saith \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Let|strong="H5186"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* people \w go|strong="H5927"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* if \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* refuse \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w*, behold, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* smite \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* \w borders|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w*:

\w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* river \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* swarm \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w*, \w which|strong="H6854"\w* \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w thine|strong="H6213"\w* house, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* bedchamber, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* people, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w thine|strong="H6213"\w* ovens, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* kneadingtroughs:

\w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w thee|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* servants.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Say \w unto|strong="H5650"\w* Aaron, Stretch forth thine hand \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H3772"\w* rod \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w*, \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w streams|strong="H2975"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pools, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w cause|strong="H5971"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron stretched \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* waters \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* frogs \w came|strong="H3068"\w* up, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* covered \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* magicians \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* manner \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H5493"\w* enchantments, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w brought|strong="H5493"\w* \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w upon|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Egypt.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w called|strong="H6817"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, Entreat \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H7760"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* people; \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people \w go|strong="H3318"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* sacrifice \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* Pharaoh, \w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* glory \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*: \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* time \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* entreat \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* people, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w frogs|strong="H6854"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* destroyed \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* remain \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* river only?

\w And|strong="H2563"\w* he said, Against tomorrow. \w And|strong="H2563"\w* he said, Be it according to thy word: that thou mayest know that there is none like unto the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* our God.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* frogs \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* depart \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* houses, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w river|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w went|strong="H4872"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* Pharaoh: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* cried \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* frogs \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H4872"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* Pharaoh.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* word \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Moses; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* frogs died \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* houses, \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* courts, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fields.

\w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* together \w in|strong="H6213"\w* heaps: \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land stank.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* saw \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* respite, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H2388"\w*; \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Say \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron, \w Stretch|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* rod, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* smite \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H3318"\w* lice \w throughout|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w so|strong="H7971"\w*; \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Aaron \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* hand \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* rod, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* smote \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dust \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* lice \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* man, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* beast; \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dust \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w became|strong="H5650"\w* lice \w throughout|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* magicians \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* enchantments \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H3045"\w* \w forth|strong="H5975"\w* lice, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* lice \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* beast.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* magicians said \w unto|strong="H5971"\w* Pharaoh, \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* finger \w of|strong="H5971"\w* God: \w and|strong="H5971"\w* Pharaoh’s heart \w was|strong="H1961"\w* hardened, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H5971"\w* hearkened \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w unto|strong="H5971"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w*; \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* spoken.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* Moses, Rise \w up|strong="H6213"\w* early \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stand \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*; lo, \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w cometh|strong="H3068"\w* \w forth|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* water; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* say \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w Thus|strong="H3651"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* people \w go|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Else, if \w thou|strong="H3212"\w* wilt \w not|strong="H3212"\w* \w let|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H7121"\w* people \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, behold, \w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w will|strong="H6547"\w* send swarms \w of|strong="H7121"\w* flies \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w thee|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w thy|strong="H7121"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w thy|strong="H7121"\w* people, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w thy|strong="H7121"\w* houses: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* houses \w of|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* Egyptians \w shall|strong="H6547"\w* be full \w of|strong="H7121"\w* swarms \w of|strong="H7121"\w* flies, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w also|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* ground whereon \w they|strong="H7121"\w* are.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sever \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Goshen, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* dwell, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* swarms \w of|strong="H3068"\w* flies \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w*; \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* end \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* mayest know \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* division between \w my|strong="H3068"\w* people \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* people: \w by|strong="H3117"\w* tomorrow \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w be|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H7971"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* grievous swarms \w of|strong="H3068"\w* flies \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* servants’ houses: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w was|strong="H3068"\w* corrupted \w by|strong="H3068"\w* reason \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* swarms \w of|strong="H3068"\w* flies.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* called \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3318"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w*, \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, \w It|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H3318"\w* \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* sacrifice \w the|strong="H3068"\w* abomination \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Egyptians \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: lo, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* sacrifice \w the|strong="H3068"\w* abomination \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Egyptians \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* eyes, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* stone us?

\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5971"\w* three days’ journey \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w command|strong="H1697"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* said, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w ye|strong="H3820"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3513"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* wilderness; \w only|strong="H1571"\w* \w ye|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w very|strong="H1571"\w* far \w away|strong="H7971"\w*: entreat \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

And Moses said, Behold, I go out from thee, and I will entreat the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* that the swarms of flies may depart from Pharaoh, from his servants, and from his people, tomorrow: only let not Pharaoh deal deceitfully any more in not letting the people go to sacrifice to the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
And Moses went out from Pharaoh, and entreated the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
And the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* did according to the word of Moses; and he removed the swarms of flies from Pharaoh, from his servants, and from his people; there remained not one.
And Pharaoh hardened his heart this time also, and he did not let the people go.
